(719x1+0)/1 mod 8192 = 719. (719x3+1)/2 mod 4096 = 1079. (719x9+5)/4 mod 2048 = 1619. (719x27+19)/8 mod 1024 = 381. (719x81+65)/16 mod 512 = 60. (719x81+65)/32 mod 256 = 30. (719x81+65)/64 mod 128 = 15. (719x243+259)/128 mod 64 = 23. (719x729+905)/256 mod 32 = 3. (719x2187+2971)/512 mod 16 = 5. (719x6561+9425)/1024 mod 8 = 0. (719x6561+9425)/2048 mod 4 = 0. (719x6561+9425)/4096 mod 2 = 0. (719x6561+9425)/8192 mod 1 = 0.
